titleStmt.title: A vvay to the tree of life discovered in sundry directions for the profitable reading of the Scriptvres : wherein is described occasionally the nature of a spirituall man, and, in A digression, the morality and perpetuity of the Fourth Commandment in every circumstance thereof, is discovered and cleared / by Iohn White ...
titleStmt.author: White, John, 1575-1648.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by M.F. for R. Royston ...,

notesStmt.note: Special t.p. : A digression concerning the morality of the Fourth Commandment.
Errors in paging: p. 125 misnumbered 225, p. 128 misnumbered 228, p. 145-146 skipped in the numbering.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
